content.prompt: Which of the following statements best describes meter?

choices.label: Meter indicates the speed of the pulse or beat.
Meter indicates the duration of the notes in relation to each other.
Meter indicates the number of beats in a measure and the division of each beat.
Meter indicates the combination of rests and notes that form a melody.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in notated music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
